001package priorityqueues.ladderq;
002
003import interfaces.Event;
004import java.util.LinkedList;
005import priorityqueues.linkedlistq.LinkedListQ;
006
007/**
008 *
009 * @author Borja Zarco
010 */
011public class Bucket {
012    
013    private Rung rung;   // rung where bucket belongs
014    private int nEvents; // Number of Events in Buket
015    private LinkedList<Event> list;
016    
017    public Bucket(Rung rung) {
018        init(rung);
019    }
020    
021    private void init(Rung rung) {
022        this.rung = rung;
023        nEvents = 0;
024        list = new LinkedList<Event>();
025    }
026
027    public LinkedList<Event> getList() { return list; }
028    public int getNEvents() { return nEvents; }
029    public void setNEvents(int nEvents) { this.nEvents = nEvents; }
030    
031    public void increaseSize() { rung.increaseSize(); nEvents++; }
032    public void decreaseSize() { rung.decreaseSize(); nEvents--; }
033    
034    public void add(Event e) { increaseSize(); list.add(e); }
035    public Event removeFirst() { decreaseSize(); return getList().pollFirst(); }
036    public void transferToBottom(LinkedListQ bottom) {
037        int size = getNEvents();
038        for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
039            bottom.enqueue(removeFirst());
040        }
041    }
042    
043}
